recipe.ingredients: - unsweetened almond milk: 2 cups - cocoa powder (unsweetened): 2 tablespoons - stevia: 2 teaspoons - vanilla extract: 1/2 teaspoon - ground cinnamon (optional): 1/4 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Heat Almond Milk: In a small saucepan, heat the almond milk over medium heat until it begins to warm and steam. 2. Mix Ingredients: While the milk is heating, in a separate small bowl, mix the cocoa powder, stevia, and optional cinnamon. 3. Combine and Simmer: Add the cocoa mixture to the warming almond milk, whisking continuously to prevent clumps. Stir in the vanilla extract. 4. Serve Warm: Once the mixture is smooth and heated through, remove from heat and pour into mugs.
